issue.title: [Python] Add benchmarks for Arrow<>Parquet BYTE_ARRAY serialization (read and write)
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-4398](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-4398). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
This is follow-on work to PARQUET-1508, so we can monitor the performance of this operation over time
